author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Streamlined the credit deduction system to use a single-source model for cleaner, more reliable accounting.
gist.impact: Users will see more consistent balance updates and a smoother experience when credits run low.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee managing distinct, organized buckets of pollen. Represents the move to a 'single-bucket' deduction logic where credits are taken from one source at a time rather than split. Clean, tidy, efficient.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee organizing three distinct wooden buckets of glowing pollen. The bee is carefully taking from just one bucket, keeping the others neat. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text 'Tidy Credits' in pixel font. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
